title: enthA pApi
sahitya:
enthA pApi drSTi tAgitu gOpAlakrSNage keTTa pApi drSTi tAgitu


caraNam 1    shishu hasidanendu gOpi mosaru kuDisuttiralu nODi hasida bAlara drSTi tAgi mosaru kuDiyalollane
    caraNam 2    krSNa hasidanendu gOpi baTTaloLage kSIra koDalu keTTa bAlara drSTi tAgi koTTa hAlu muTTane
    caraNam 3    ciNNa hasidanendu gOpi beNNe kaiyali koDalu nODi saNNa bAlara drSTi tAgi beNNe viSamavAyite
    caraNam 4    angi hAki unguraviTTu kangaLige kappaniTTu angaLadoLu Ado krSNage hengaLA drSTi idEnO
    caraNam 5    shalle uDisi malle muDisi celva phaNage tilakaniTTu vallabha purandara viTTalana pullanEtraru nODidarEnO
